name: X Wizard
description: What is the project about? 𝕏 Wizard - A Platform built for Game of Chances. 𝕏 Wizard focuses on building Gamefi Ecosystem and user’s experience on Dapp. What makes your project unique? - A Platform where Games are built on - Main Dapp to access all activities History of your project. - A Bet Game on developed on 𝕏 Wizard - Crash Game - Investors try to cash out before it crashes. What’s next for your project? Partnership with big other projects. Marketing activities, build more games and develop telegram bot for users to play What can your token be used for? It can be used as currency in our game for betting, swapping, and many other games
